This IE defines the parameters for M5 measurement
collection.

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN List
descriptionList:
The purpose of the MDT PLMN List IE
is to provide the list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list. Value
  is 16.

definitionList.name: COUNT Value Extended
descriptionList:
This IE contains a PDCP sequence number and
a hyper frame number in case of 15 bit long PDCP-SN.

definitionList.name: Kill-all Warning Messages Indicator
descriptionList:
The Kill-all Warning
Messages Indicator IE indicates to the eNB to stop all already ongoing broadcast of warning messages in the eNB
or in an area.

definitionList.name: LHN ID
descriptionList:
The LHN
ID IE is used to indicate
the LHN ID of the eNB, as defined in TS 23.003 [21].

elementList.name: Local Home Network ID
elementList.description: Identifies the Local Home Network.

definitionList.name: User Location Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides location
information of a UE.

definitionList.name: MBSFN-ResultToLog
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the MBMS area in which the MBSFN MDT result is logged.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum number of MBSFN areas configured for logged MBSFN
  MDT. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: EARFCN
descriptionList:
The E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel
Number defines the carrier frequency used in a cell for a given direction (UL
or DL) in FDD or for both UL and DL directions in TDD.

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: The relation between EARFCN and carrier frequency (in MHz) are defined in TS 36.104 [39].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum value of EARFCNs.
  Value is 262143.

definitionList.name: Expected UE Behaviour
descriptionList:
This IE
defines the behaviour of a UE with predictable activity and/or mobility behaviour,
to assist the eNB in determining the optimum RRC connection time.

elementList.name: Expected HO Interval
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (sec15, sec30, sec60, sec90, sec120, sec180, long-time, ...)
elementList.description: Indicates the expected time interval between inter-eNB handovers. If "long-time" is included, the interval between inter-eNB handovers is expected to be longer than 180 seconds.

definitionList.name: Expected UE Activity Behaviour
descriptionList:
Indicates
information about the expected "UE activity behaviour" as defined in
TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: Expected Activity Period
elementList.description: If this IE is set to "181" the expected activity time is longer than 180 seconds. The remaining values indicate the expected activity time in [seconds].

elementList.name: Expected Idle Period
elementList.description: If this IE is set to "181" the expected idle time is longer than 180 seconds. The remaining values indicate the expected idle time in [seconds].

elementList.name: Source of UE Activity Behaviour Information
elementList.description: If "subscription information" is indicated, the information contained in the Expected Activity Period IE and the Expected Idle Period IE, if present, is derived from subscription information. If "statistics" is indicated, the information contained in the Expected Activity Period IE and the Expected Idle Period IE, if present, is derived from statistical information.

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability for Paging
descriptionList:
This IE
contains paging specific UE Radio Capability information.

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability for Paging
elementList.description: Includes either the UERadioPagingInformation message as defined in 10.2.2 of TS 36.331 [16], or the UERadioPagingInformation-NB message as defined in 10.6.2 of TS 36.331 [16].

definitionList.name: ProSe Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the authorization status of the UE for ProSe services.

elementList.name: ProSe Direct Discovery
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for ProSe Direct Discovery

elementList.name: ProSe Direct Communication
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized for ProSe Direct Communication

elementList.name: ProSe UE-to-Network Relaying
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized to act as ProSe UE-to-Network Relay

definitionList.name: COUNT Value for PDCP SN Length 18
descriptionList:
This IE contains a PDCP sequence number and
a hyper frame number in case of 18 bit long PDCP-SN.

definitionList.name: M6 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M6 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M6 Delay Threshold
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms30, ms40, ms50, ms60, ms70, ms80, ms90, ms100, ms150, ms300, ms500, ms750, )

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the M6 Links to log IE is set to  uplink  or to  both-uplink-and-downlink .

definitionList.name: M7 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M7 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M7 Collection Period
elementList.description: Unit: minutes

definitionList.name: Assistance Data for Paging
descriptionList: This IE provides assistance information for paging optimisation.

elementList.name: Assistance Data for CE capable UEs

definitionList.name: Assistance Data for Recommended Cells
descriptionList: This IE provides assistance information for paging in recommended cells.

definitionList.name: Information on Recommended Cells and eNBs for Paging
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on recommended cells and eNBs for paging.

definitionList.name: Recommended Cells for Paging
descriptionList:
This IE contains
the recommended cells for paging.
This IE is transparent to the EPC.

elementList.name: Recommended Cell Item IEs
elementList.description: Includes visited and non-visited cells, where visited cells are listed in the order the UE visited them with the most recent cell being the first in the list. Non-visited cells are included immediately after the visited cell they are associated with.

elementList.name: Time Stayed in Cell
elementList.description: This is included for visited cells and indicates the time a UE stayed in a cell in seconds. If the UE stays in a cell more than 4095 seconds, this IE is set to 4095.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of recommended Cells, the maximum
  value is 16.

definitionList.name: Recommended eNBs for Paging
descriptionList:
This IE contains
recommended targets for paging.

elementList.name: Recommended eNB Item IEs
elementList.description: Includes visited and non-visited eNBs, where visited eNBs are listed in the order the UE visited them with the most recent eNB being the first in the list. Non-visited eNBs are included after the visited eNB they are associated with.

elementList.name: Choice MME Paging Target
elementList.description: The MME paging target is either an eNB identity or a TAI as specified in TS 36.300 [14].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of recommended eNBs, the maximum
  value is 16.

definitionList.name: Assistance Data for CE capable UEs
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
for paging for CE capable UEs.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier and Coverage Enhancement Level

definitionList.name: Cell Identifier and Coverage Enhancement Level
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
for paging CE capable UEs.

elementList.name: Coverage Enhancement Level
elementList.description: Includes either the UEPagingCoverageInformation message as defined in 10.2.2 of TS 36.331 [16], or the UEPagingCoverageInformation-NB message as defined in 10.6.2 of TS 36.331 [16].

definitionList.name: Paging Attempt Information
descriptionList:
This IE includes information related to the
paging count over S1.

elementList.name: Paging Attempt Count
elementList.description: Shall be set as specified in TS 36.300 [14].

elementList.name: Intended Number of Paging Attempts
elementList.description: Intended number of paging attempts (see TS 36.300 [14]).

elementList.name: Next Paging Area Scope
elementList.description: Indicates whether the paging area scope will change or not at next paging attempt. Usage specified in TS 36.300 [14].

definitionList.name: Paging eDRX Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Paging eDRX parameters
as defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: Paging eDRX Cycle
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (hfhalf, hf1, hf2, hf4, hf6, hf8, hf10, hf12, hf14, hf16, hf32, hf64, hf128, hf256, )
elementList.description: TeDRX defined in TS 36.304 [20]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

elementList.name: Paging Time Window
elementList.description: Unit: [1.28 second].

definitionList.name: UE Retention Information
descriptionList:
This information element allows the eNB and
the MME to indicate whether prior UE related contexts and signalling connections
are intended to be retained.

definitionList.name: UE User Plane CIoT Support Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
whether User Plane CIoT EPS Optimisation as specified in TS 23.401 [11] is
supported for the UE.

elementList.name: UE User Plane CIoT Support Indicator

definitionList.name: NB-IoT Default Paging DRX
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NB-IoT Default Paging DRX as defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: NB-IoT Default Paging DRX
elementList.description: Unit: [number of radioframes]

definitionList.name: NB-IoT Paging eDRX Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NB-IoT Paging eDRX parameters as defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: NB-IoT Paging eDRX Cycle
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (hf2, hf4, hf6, hf8, hf10, hf12, hf14, hf16, hf32, hf64, hf128, hf256, hf512, hf1024, )
elementList.description: TeDRX defined in TS 36.304 [20]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

elementList.name: NB-IoT Paging Time Window
elementList.description: Unit: [2.56 seconds]

definitionList.name: Bearer Type
descriptionList:
This IE is used to support Non-IP data as
specified in TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: RAT Type
descriptionList:
This element is provided
by the eNB to inform about the RAT Type.

definitionList.name: CE-mode-B Support Indicator
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
whether CE-mode-B as specified in TS 36.306[41] is supported for the UE.

definitionList.name: SRVCC Operation Not Possible
descriptionList: This element indicates that SRVCC operation is not possible any more.

definitionList.name: V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the authorization status of the UE to use the
sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE

definitionList.name: Served DCNs Items
descriptionList:
The Served DCNs Items indicates the relative
processing capacity for a DCN-ID in the MME as defined in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: Relative DCN Capacity
elementList.description: Relatvie capacity per DCN in one MME

definitionList.name: UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE s sidelink communication for V2X services.

elementList.name: UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving eNB.

definitionList.name: Enhanced Coverage Restricted
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the restriction information of using Coverage Enhancement.

elementList.name: Enhanced Coverage Restricted
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is restricted to use coverage enhancement. Value restricted indicates that the UE is not allowed to use coverage enhancement.

definitionList.name: Secondary RAT Usage Report List
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the NR resources used with EN-DC.

elementList.name: Start timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [42]. It indicates the start time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: End timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [42]. It indicates the end time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: Usage count UL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets

elementList.name: Usage count DL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of E-RABs for one UE. Value is 256.

Maximum no. of time reporting periods. Value is
  2.

definitionList.name: Handover Flag
descriptionList:
This IE indicates
that the MME should buffer the secondary RAT data usage report since the report is sent due to handover as defined in TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: Extended Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the number of bits delivered
by E-UTRAN in UL or to E-UTRAN in DL within a period of time, divided by the
duration of the period. It is used, for example, to indicate the maximum or
guaranteed bit rate for a GBR bearer, or an aggregated maximum bit rate.

elementList.name: Extended Bit Rate
elementList.description: The unit is: bit/s

definitionList.name: NR UE Security Capabilities
descriptionList:
This IE defines the supported algorithms
for encryption and integrity protection in NR as
defined in TS 33.401 [15].

elementList.name: NR Encryption Algorithms
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an encryption algorithm: all bits equal to 0 UE supports no other NR algorithm than NEA0, first bit 128-NEA1, second bit 128-NEA2, third bit 128-NEA3, other bits reserved for future use. Value 1 indicates support and value 0 indicates no support of the algorithm. Algorithms are defined in TS 33.401 [15].

elementList.name: NR Integrity Protection Algorithms
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an integrity protection algorithm: all bits equal to 0 UE supports no other NR algorithm than NIA0, first bit 128-NIA1, second bit 128-NIA2, third bit 128-NIA3, other bits reserved for future use. Value 1 indicates support and value 0 indicates no support of the algorithm. Algorithms are defined in TS 33.401 [15].

definitionList.name: UE Application layer measurement configuration
descriptionList:
The IE defines configuration information
for the QoE Measurement Collection (QMC) function.

elementList.name: Container for application layer measurement configuration
elementList.description: Indicates application layer measurement configuration, see Annex L in [43].

elementList.name: TAC
elementList.description: The TAI is derived using the current serving PLMN.

elementList.name: Service Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (QMC for streaming service, QMC for MTSI service, ...)
elementList.description: This IE indicates the service type of UE application layer measurements.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Cell ID subject for QMC scope. Value is 32.
Maximum no. of TA subject for QMC scope. Value is 8.

Maximum no. of PLMNs in the PLMN list for QMC
  scope. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: CE-mode-B Restricted
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the restriction information of using Coverage Enhancement Mode B.

elementList.name: CE-mode-B Restricted
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is restricted to use coverage enhancement. Value restricted indicates that the UE is not allowed to use coverage enhancement mode B. Value not-restricted indicates that the UE is allowed to use coverage enhancement mode B.

definitionList.name: Packet Loss Rate
descriptionList: This IE indicates the packet loss rate.

elementList.name: Packet Loss Rate
elementList.description: Ratio of lost packets per number of packets sent, expressed in tenth of percent.

definitionList.name: Global RAN Node ID
descriptionList:
This IE is
used to globally identify an NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: Global gNB ID
descriptionList:
This IE is
used to globally identify a gNB (see TS 38.300 [45]).

elementList.name: gNB ID
elementList.description: Equal to the leftmost bits of the NR Cell Identity IE contained in the NR CGI IE of each cell served by the gNB.

definitionList.name: LTE-M Indication
descriptionList:
This element is
provided by the eNB to inform that the UE indicates category M1 or M2 in its UE
Radio Capability.

definitionList.name: Aerial UE subscription information
descriptionList:
This information element is used by the eNB
to know if the UE is allowed to use aerial UE function, refer to TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: Bluetooth Measurement Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE defines the parameters for Bluetooth
measurement collection.

elementList.name: Bluetooth Measurement Configuration Name Item IEs
BT RSSI
elementList.description: In case of Immediate MDT, it corresponds to M8 measurement as defined in 37.320 [31].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Bluetooth local name used for
  Bluetooth measurement collection. Value is 4.

definitionList.name: WLAN Measurement Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for WLAN measurement collection.

elementList.name: WLAN Measurement Configuration Name Item IEs
WLAN RSSI
elementList.description: In case of Immediate MDT, it corresponds to M8 as defined in 37.320 [31].

elementList.name: WLAN RTT
elementList.description: In case of Immediate MDT, it corresponds to M9 as defined in 37.320 [31].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of WLAN SSID used for WLAN measurement collection. Value is 4.

definitionList.name: Warning Area Coordinates
descriptionList:
This IE contains the affected alert area coordinates
of a warning message, and will be broadcast over the radio interface.

elementList.name: Warning Area Coordinates
elementList.description: The length of this IE varies between 1 to 1024 bytes.

definitionList.name: Subscription Based UE Differentiation Information
descriptionList:
This IE is generated by the MME based on
the UE subscription information, it provides the Subscription Based UE
differentiation Information.

elementList.name: Periodic Communication Indicator
elementList.description: This IE indicates whether the UE communicates periodically or not, e.g. only on demand.

elementList.name: Periodic Time
elementList.description: This IE indicates the interval time of periodic communication, the unit is: second

elementList.name: Scheduled Communication Time
elementList.description: This IE indicates the time zone and day of the week when the UE is available for communication.

elementList.name: Day of Week
elementList.description: If Day-Of-Week is not provided this shall be interpreted as every day of the week. Each position in the bitmap represents a day of the week: first bit = Mon, second bit =Tue, third bit =Wed, and so on. Value 1 indicates scheduled. Value 0 indicates not scheduled .

elementList.name: Time of Day Start
elementList.description: This IE indicates the time to start of the day, each value represent the corresponding second since 00:00 of the day. If Time-Of-Day-Start is not provided, starting time shall be set to start of the day(s) indicated by Day-Of-Week-Mask.

elementList.name: Time of Day End
elementList.description: This IE indicates the time to start of the day, each value represent the corresponding second since 00:00 of the day. The value of this IE should be bigger than the value of Time of Day Start IE. If Time-Of-Day-End is not provided, ending time is end of the day(s) indicated by Day-Of-Week-Mask.

elementList.name: Traffic Profile
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(single packet, dual packets, multiple packets, )
elementList.description: single packet indicates single packet transmission (UL or DL), dual packets indicates dual packet transmission (UL with subsequent DL, or DL with subsequent UL), multiple packets indicates multiple packets transmission.

elementList.name: Battery Indication
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(battery powered, battery powered not rechargeable or replaceable, not battery powered, )
elementList.description: battery powered indicates that the UE is battery powered and the battery is rechargeable/replaceable, battery powered not rechargeable or replaceable indicates that the UE is battery powered but the battery is not rechargeable/replaceable,, not battery powered indicates that the UE is not battery powered.

definitionList.name: PSCell Information
descriptionList:
This IE includes the information of the
UE s PSCell.

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList:
This IE is
used to globally identify an NR cell (see TS 38.300 [45]).

definitionList.name: Time Since Secondary Node Release
descriptionList:
This IE
indicates the time elapsed since the completion of the EN-DC release procedure.

elementList.name: Time Since Secondary Node Release
elementList.description: Time in seconds. Max value indicates the elapsed time was equal or longer than the value.

definitionList.name: UE Context Reference at Source
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies a UE association over an NG interface and the source NG-RAN
node.

elementList.name: RAN UE NGAP ID
elementList.description: Allocated at the source (Master-)NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: RAN UE NGAP ID
descriptionList:
This IE uniquely identifies the UE association
over the NG interface within the NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: IAB Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information about the
authorization status of the IAB-node.

elementList.name: IAB Authorized
elementList.description: Indicates the IAB-node authorization status.

definitionList.name: Ethernet Type
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate that Ethernet data
is expected.

definitionList.name: NR V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the authorization status of the UE to use the NR
sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE.

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE.

definitionList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE s sidelink communication for NR V2X services.

elementList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving eNB.

definitionList.name: PC5 QoS Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the PC5 QoS parameters of the UE s sidelink communication for NR PC5.

elementList.name: PQI
elementList.description: PQI is a special 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: PC5 Flow Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Range
elementList.description: Only applies for groupcast.

elementList.name: PC5 Link Aggregated Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for non-GBR QoS Flows.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PC5 QoS
  flows allowed towards one UE. Value is 2048.

definitionList.name: Inter System Measurement Configuration
descriptionList:
The Inter-System
Measurement Configuration IE contains information for
instructing the incoming UE to continue measuring the cells of the NR RAT after
a successful inter-system handover to LTE network.

elementList.name: RSRP
elementList.description: Threshold of RSRP.

elementList.name: RSRQ
elementList.description: Threshold of RSRQ.

elementList.name: SINR
elementList.description: Threshold of SINR

elementList.name: Measurement Duration
elementList.description: The period of time following the successful IRAT handover, during which the target RAT instructs the UE to measure cells of the source RAT. Unit: [second].

elementList.name: Inter-System Measurement Item
elementList.description: List of inter-system measurements configured

elementList.name: FreqBandIndicatorNR
elementList.description: The frequency band in which the ssbFrequency is located and according to which the UE shall perform the RRC measurements.

elementList.name: SSB frequencies
elementList.description: Designates the specific SSB frequencies i.e., ARFCN-ValueNR which the target RAT may instruct the UE to measure.

elementList.name: SubcarrierSpacingSSB
elementList.description: Subcarrier spacing of SSB according to TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: maxRS-IndexCellQual
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum number of RS indices to be considered/ averaged to derive the cell quality for RRM.Also defined in TS 36.331 [16]

elementList.name: SMTC
elementList.description: Contains the MTC-SSB-NR-15 as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: threshRS-Index-r15
elementList.description: threshRS-Index-r15as defined in TS 36.331 [16]，List of thresholds for consolidation of L1 measurements per RS index

elementList.name: SSB-ToMeasure
elementList.description: Contains the IE SSB-ToMeasure as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: SS-RSSI-Measurements
elementList.description: Contains the IE SS-RSSI-Measurement as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: quantityConfigNR-R15
elementList.description: Indicates the quantityConfigNR-R15 as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: blackCellsToAddModList
elementList.description: List of cells to add/modify in the black list of cells. It applies only to SSB resources. As defined in TS 36.331 [16].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of frequencies. Value is 64.

Maximum value of NR carrier frequency, defined
  in TS 38.331 [50]. Value is
  3279165

Maximum number of RS indices averaged to derive
  cell quality for RRM, defined in TS 36.331 [16]. Value is 16

definitionList.name: Source Node ID
descriptionList:
The Source Node ID IE identifies the
source for the handover.

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability ID
descriptionList: This IE contains UE Radio Capability ID.

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability ID
elementList.description: Defined in TS 23.003 [21].

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability NR Format
descriptionList:
This IE contains UE Radio Capability
information format encoded as specified in TS 38.331 [50] in order to support
Mode of operation A as specified in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability NR Format
elementList.description: Includes UERadioAccessCapabilityInformation message as defined in TS 38.331 [50].

definitionList.name: DAPS Request Information
descriptionList:
The DAPS Indicator IE indicates that
the source eNB requests a DAPS Handover for the concerned
E-RAB.

elementList.name: DAPS Indicator
elementList.description: Indicates that DAPS Handover is requested

definitionList.name: DAPS Response Information
descriptionList:
The DAPS Response Indicator IE
indicates the response to a requested DAPS Handover for the concerned E-RAB.

elementList.name: DAPS Response Indicator
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (DAPS HO accepted, DAPS HO not accepted, )
elementList.description: Indicates that DAPS Handover is accepted or not

definitionList.name: eNB Early Status Transfer Transparent Container
descriptionList:
The eNB Early Status Transfer Transparent
Container IE is an information element that is produced by the source eNB and is transmitted to the target
eNB. This IE is used for the intra SAE/LTE S1 DAPS handover case.
This IE is transparent to the EPC.

elementList.name: E-RABs Subject to Early Status Transfer List
E-RABs Subject to Early Status Transfer Item
DL COUNT Value for PDCP SN Length 12
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number of the first DL SDU that the source eNB forwards to the target eNB in case of 12 bit long PDCP-SN.

elementList.name: DL COUNT Value for PDCP SN Length 15
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number of the first DL SDU that the source eNB forwards to the target eNB in case of 15 bit long PDCP-SN.

elementList.name: DL COUNT Value for PDCP SN Length 18
elementList.reference: COUNT Value for PDCP SN Length 18 9.2.1.100
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number of the first DL SDU that the source eNB forwards to the target eNB in case of 18 bit long PDCP-SN.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of E-RABs for one UE. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: WUS Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides WUS Assistance Information
to be used by eNB for determining the WUS group for the UE.

elementList.name: Paging Probability Information
elementList.description: Unit: percentage

definitionList.name: NB-IoT Paging DRX
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the NB-IoT UE specific
Paging DRX as defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: NB-IoT Paging DRX
elementList.description: Unit: [number of radioframes]

definitionList.name: Transport Layer Address
descriptionList:
This
information element is an IP address.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: The Radio Network Layer is not supposed to interpret the address information. It should pass it to the transport layer for interpretation. For details on the Transport Layer Address, see TS 36.414 [12].

definitionList.name: GTP-TEID
descriptionList:
This information element is the GTP Tunnel
Endpoint Identifier to be used for the user plane transport between eNB and the
serving gateway.

elementList.name: GTP-TEID
elementList.description: For details and range, see TS 29.281 [32].

definitionList.name: Tunnel Information
descriptionList:
The Tunnel Information IE indicates
the transport layer address and UDP port number.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: HeNB s Transport Layer Address.

elementList.name: UDP Port Numbers
elementList.description: UDP Port Numbers if NAT/NAPT is deployed in the BBF access network.

definitionList.name: URI
descriptionList:
This IE is a
URI.

elementList.name: URI
elementList.description: String representing URI (Uniform Resource Identifier)

definitionList.name: LAI
descriptionList:
This
information element is used to uniquely identify a Location Area.

elementList.name: LAC
elementList.description: 0000 and FFFE not allowed.

definitionList.name: RAC
descriptionList:
This information element is used to
identify a Routing Area within a Location Area. It is used for PS services.

definitionList.name: MME UE S1AP ID
descriptionList:
The MME UE S1AP ID uniquely identifies the
UE association over the S1 interface within the MME.

definitionList.name: eNB UE S1AP ID
descriptionList:
The eNB UE
S1AP ID uniquely identifies the UE association over the S1 interface within the
eNB.

definitionList.name: NAS-PDU
descriptionList:
This information
element contains an EPC   UE or
UE   EPC message that is transferred without interpretation in the eNB.

definitionList.name: S-TMSI
descriptionList:
The
Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identity is used for security reasons, to hide the
identity of a subscriber.

elementList.name: M-TMSI
elementList.description: M-TMSI is unique within MME that allocated it.

definitionList.name: TAC
descriptionList:
This
information element is used to uniquely identify a Tracking Area Code.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList:
This information element indicates the PLMN
Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -The PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: GUMMEI
descriptionList:
This information element indicates the
globally unique MME identity.

definitionList.name: UE Identity Index value
descriptionList:
The UE Identity Index value IE is used
by the eNB to calculate the Paging Frame TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: UE Identity Index Value
elementList.description: Coded as specified in TS 36.304 [20].

definitionList.name: IMSI
descriptionList:
This information element contains an International Mobile Subscriber Identity, which is
commonly used to identify the UE in the CN.

elementList.name: IMSI
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bit 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bit 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -Number of decimal digits shall be from 6 to 15 starting with the digits from the PLMN identity. When the IMSI is made of an odd number of digits, the filler digit shall be added at the end to make an even number of digits of length 2N. The filler digit shall then be consequently encoded as bit 8 to 5 of octet N.

definitionList.name: MMEC
descriptionList:
This information element represents the MME
Code to uniquely identify an MME within an MME pool area.

definitionList.name: UE Paging Identity
descriptionList:
This IE represents
the Identity with which the UE is paged.

definitionList.name: DL Forwarding
descriptionList:
This information element indicates that the
E-RAB is proposed for forwarding of downlink packets.

definitionList.name: Direct Forwarding Path Availability
descriptionList:
The availability of a direct forwarding
path shall be determined by the source eNB. The EPC behaviour on receipt of this
IE is specified in TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: TAI
descriptionList:
This
information element is used to uniquely identify a Tracking Area.

definitionList.name: Relative MME Capacity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the relative processing
capacity of an MME with respect to the other MMEs in the pool in order to
load-balance MMEs within a pool defined in TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: UE S1AP ID pair
descriptionList:
This IE contains a pair of UE S1AP
identities.

definitionList.name: Overload Response
descriptionList:
The Overload Response IE indicates
the required behaviour of the eNB in an overload situation.

definitionList.name: Overload Action
descriptionList:
The Overload Action IE indicates which
signalling traffic is subject to rejection by the eNB in an MME overload
situation as defined in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: Overload Action
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Reject RRC connection establishments for non-emergency MO DT, Reject RRC connection establishments for Signalling, Permit Emergency Sessions and mobile terminated services only, , Permit High Priority Sessions and mobile terminated services only, Reject delay tolerant access, Permit high priority sessions and exception reporting and mobile terminated services only, not accept mo-data or delay tolerant access from CP CIoT)

definitionList.name: CS Fallback Indicator
descriptionList:
The IE indicates that a fallback to the CS
domain is needed.

elementList.name: CS Fallback Indicator
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(CS Fallback required, , CS Fallback High Priority)

definitionList.name: CN Domain
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether Paging is
originated from the CS or PS domain.

definitionList.name: RIM Transfer
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RIM Information (e.g.
NACC information) and additionally in uplink transfers the RIM routing address
of the destination of this RIM information.

definitionList.name: RIM Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RIM Information (e.g.,
NACC information) i.e., the BSSGP RIM PDU from the RIM application part contained
in the eNB, or the BSSGP RIM PDU to be forwarded to the RIM application part in
the eNB.

elementList.name: RIM Information
elementList.description: Contains the BSSGP RIM PDU as defined in TS 48.018 [18].

definitionList.name: RIM Routing Address
descriptionList:
This IE identifies the destination node
where the RIM Information needs to be routed by the CN.

elementList.name: RNC-ID
elementList.description: If the Extended RNC-ID IE is included in the Target ID IE, the RNC-ID IE shall be ignored.

elementList.name: Extended RNC-ID
elementList.description: The Extended RNC-ID IE shall be used if the RNC identity has a value larger than 4095.

elementList.name: eHRPD Sector ID
elementList.description: Contains the eHRPD Sector ID as defined in 3GPP2 C.S0024-B [27] sub-section 13.9.

definitionList.name: SON Configuration Transfer
descriptionList:
This IE contains the configuration information,
used by e.g., SON functionality, and additionally includes the eNB identifier
of the destination of this configuration information and the eNB identifier of
the source of this information.

elementList.name: X2 TNL Configuration Info
elementList.description: Source eNB X2 TNL Configuration Info.

elementList.name: Synchronisation Information
elementList.description: Information on cell selected as source of synchronisation and aggressor cells.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be
  present if the SON Information IE contains the SON Information
  Request IE set to  X2TNL Configuration Info

This IE shall be
  present if the SON Information IE contains the SON Information
  Request IE set to  Activate Muting

definitionList.name: EN-DC SON Configuration Transfer
descriptionList:
This IE contains the configuration information,
used by SON functionality for EN-DC for communication between a destination (target) en-gNB and a source eNB.

elementList.name: Request
elementList.description: NOTE: Used if the SON Information IE indicates a request.

elementList.name: Selected TAI
elementList.description: The MME may ignore this IE if any of the following IEs are present in the EN-DC SON Configuration Transfer IE: Target eNB-ID, Associated TAI, Broadcast 5GS TAI. NOTE: The Selected TAI is a 4G TAI and should, if available, correspond to the TAI configured at the en-gNB, however, this TAI is not broadcast by the respective NR cell and may not always be available from UE reporting TAIs of overlapping E-UTRA cells.

elementList.name: Associated TAI
elementList.description: A 4G TAI associated with the target en-gNB as specified in TS 36.300 [15].

elementList.name: Broadcast 5GS TAI
elementList.description: A Broadcast 5GS TAI of the en-gNB as specified in TS 36.300 [15].

elementList.name: Reply
elementList.description: NOTE: Used if the SON Information IE indicates a reply.

elementList.name: Selected TAI
elementList.description: NOTE: The Selected TAI contains a configured TAC of the en-gNB.

elementList.name: X2 TNL Configuration Info
elementList.description: Source eNB X2 TNL Configuration Info.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be
  present if the SON Information IE contains the SON Information
  Request IE set to  X2 TNL Configuration Info

definitionList.name: SON Information
descriptionList:
This IE identifies the nature of the configuration
information transferred, i.e., a request, a reply or a report.

elementList.name: SON Information Request
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(X2 TNL Configuration Info, , Time synchronisation Info, Activate Muting, Deactivate Muting)
elementList.description: In the current version of the specification only "X2 NTL Configuration Info" is applicable for EN-DC.

definitionList.name: SON Information Reply
descriptionList:
This IE contains the configuration
information to be replied to the eNB.

definitionList.name: X2 TNL Configuration Info
descriptionList:
The X2 TNL Configuration Info IE is
used for signalling X2 TNL Configuration information for automatic X2 SCTP
association establishment. It contains TNL addresses of either an eNB or, in
the context of EN-DC, of an en-gNB.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Addresses for X2 SCTP end-point.

elementList.name: eNB X2 Extended Transport Layer Addresses
IP-Sec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Addresses for IP-Sec end-point.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Addresses for GTP end-points (used for data forwarding over X2 or for transport of X2-U user data for dual connectivity).

elementList.name: eNB Indirect X2 Transport Layer Addresses
Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Addresses for Indirect X2 SCTP end-point.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of eNB X2 Transport Layer Addresses
  for an SCTP end-point. Value is 2.

Maximum no. of eNB X2 Extended Transport Layer
  Addresses in the message. Value is 16.

Maximum no. of eNB X2 GTP Transport Layer
  Addresses for an GTP end-point in the message. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: NAS Security Parameters from E-UTRAN
descriptionList:
The purpose of the NAS Security Parameters from E-UTRAN IE
is to provide security related
parameters for I-RAT handovers from E-UTRAN via the eNB to the UE.

elementList.name: NAS Security Parameters from E-UTRAN
elementList.description: Coded as the value part of NAS security parameters from E-UTRA IE defined in TS 24.301 [24].

definitionList.name: NAS Security Parameters to E-UTRAN
descriptionList:
The purpose of the NAS Security Parameters to E-UTRAN IE is
to provide security related parameters
for I-RAT handovers to E-UTRAN via the RNC or BSS to the UE.

elementList.name: NAS Security Parameters to E-UTRAN
elementList.description: Coded as the value part of NAS security parameters to E-UTRA IE defined in TS 24.301 [24].

definitionList.name: LPPa-PDU
descriptionList:
This
information element contains an eNB   E-SMLC or E-SMLC   eNB message that is transferred without
interpretation in the MME.

definitionList.name: Routing ID
descriptionList:
This information element is used to identify
an E-SMLC within the EPC.

definitionList.name: Time Synchronisation Info
descriptionList:
The Time Synchronisation Info IE is used for signalling stratum level, synchronisation status and muting availability for over-the-air
synchronisation using network listening.

elementList.name: Muting Availability Indication
elementList.description: Indicates availability of muting activation.

definitionList.name: Traffic Load Reduction Indication
descriptionList:
The Traffic Load Reduction Indication
IE indicates the percentage of the type of traffic relative to the instantaneous
incoming rate at the eNB, as indicated in the Overload Action IE, to be
rejected.

definitionList.name: Additional CS Fallback Indicator
descriptionList:
The IE indicates whether the restrictions
contained in the Handover Restriction List IE apply or not to the CS
Fallback High Priority call.

definitionList.name: Masked IMEISV
descriptionList:
This information element contains the IMEISV value with a mask, to identify a terminal
model without identifying an individual Mobile Equipment.

elementList.name: Masked IMEISV
elementList.description: Coded as the International Mobile station Equipment Identity and Software Version Number (IMEISV) defined in TS 23.003 [21] with the last 4 digits of the SNR masked by setting the corresponding bits to 1. The first to fourth bits correspond to the first digit of the IMEISV, the fifth to eighth bits correspond to the second digit of the IMEISV, and so on.

definitionList.name: SON Information Report
descriptionList:
This IE contains the configuration information
to be transferred to the eNB.

definitionList.name: RLF Report Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains the RLF report information
to be transferred to the eNB.

elementList.name: UE RLF Report Container
elementList.description: rlf-Report-r9 contained in UEInformationResponse message as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

elementList.name: UE RLF Report Container for extended bands
elementList.description: rlf-Report-v9e0 contained in the UEInformationResponse message (TS 36.331 [16])

elementList.name: NB-IoT RLF Report Container
elementList.description: rlf-Report-NB-r16 contained in UEInformationResponse-NB message, as defined in TS 36.331 [16].

definitionList.name: Muting Pattern Information
descriptionList: This information element contains muting pattern information that can be used for over-the-air synchronisation using network listening.

elementList.name: Muting Pattern Period
elementList.description: Period for repetition of muted subframe in milliseconds. Value 0 indicates that the muting request is not fulfilled.

elementList.name: Muting Pattern Offset
elementList.description: Offset in number of subframes of the muting pattern starting from subframe 0 in a radio frame where SFN = 0. If this IE is not present, the receiving eNB may consider the requested muting pattern offset in the former request has been accepted.

definitionList.name: Synchronisation Information
descriptionList:
This information element contains information concerning the cell selected as source of
synchronisation signal by the sending eNB.

elementList.name: Source Stratum Level
elementList.description: Stratum Level of cell selected as synchronisation source. The range of this IE is limited to 0..2.

elementList.name: Listening Subframe Pattern
elementList.description: Subframe pattern where the Reference Signals can be detected for synchronisation.

elementList.name: Aggressor Cell List
elementList.description: List of cells for which the muting pattern need to be activated.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by an eNB.
  Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Listening Subframe Pattern
descriptionList:
This information element contains information concerning the pattern of subframes where the reference
signals can be detected for the purpose of over the air synchronisation via
network listening.

elementList.name: Pattern Period
elementList.description: Period in milliseconds for repetition of the subframe where reference signals are available.

elementList.name: Pattern Offset
elementList.description: Offset in number of subframes of the reference signals starting from subframe 0 in a radio frame where SFN = 0.

definitionList.name: MME Group ID
descriptionList:
This information element contains information concerning the MME Group ID that identifies a group of
MME s.

elementList.name: MME Group ID
elementList.description: The MME Group ID is defined in TS 23.003 [21]

definitionList.name: Additional GUTI
descriptionList: This information element contains DCN related information to for identification of a CN node.

definitionList.name: Extended UE Identity Index Value
descriptionList:
The Extended UE Identity Index Value
IE is used by the eNB to calculate the paging resources to be used for the UE, as
defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: Extended UE Identity Index Value
elementList.description: Corresponds to the UE_ID used to determine the Paging Narrowband and the NB-IoT paging carrier as specified in TS 36.304 [20].

definitionList.name: NB-IoT UE Identity Index Value
descriptionList:
The NB-IoT UE Identity Index Value
IE is used by the eNB to calculate the paging resources to be used for the UE,
as defined in TS 36.304 [20].

elementList.name: NB-IoT UE Identity Index Value
elementList.description: Coded as specified in TS 36.304 [20].

definitionList.name: DL NAS PDU Delivey Request
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the request to
acknowledge the successful delivery of a downlink NAS PDU as specified in TS
23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: DL CP Security Information
descriptionList:
The DL CP Security Information IE
contains NAS level security information to be forwarded to the UE as described
in TS 33.401 [15].

elementList.name: DL NAS MAC
elementList.description: Defined in TS 33.401 [15].

definitionList.name: UL CP Security Information
descriptionList:
The UL CP Security Information IE
contains NAS level security information to enable UE authentication by the MME
as described in TS 33.401 [15].

elementList.name: UL NAS MAC
elementList.description: Defined in TS 33.401 [15].

elementList.name: UL NAS Count
elementList.description: Defined in TS 33.401 [15].

definitionList.name: UE Capability Info Request
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the request to provide to
the MME the UE capability related information when retrieved from the UE.

definitionList.name: 5GS TAI
descriptionList:
This information element is used to uniquely identify a 5GS Tracking
Area.

definitionList.name: 5GS TAC
descriptionList:
This information element is used to uniquely identify a 5GS Tracking
Area Code.

definitionList.name: End Indication
descriptionList:
The End Indication IE indicates that
there are no further NAS PDUs to be transmitted for this UE.

elementList.name: End Indication
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (no further data, further data exists, )

definitionList.name: Pending Data Indication
descriptionList:
This IE indicates that the MME is aware of
pending signalling or data in the network for the UE, or that the MME expects a
response from the UE.

definitionList.name: SON Transfer Application Identity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the application identity
within the SON Transfer application.

elementList.name: SON Transfer Application Identity
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Cell Load Reporting, , Multi-Cell Load Reporting, Event-Triggered Cell Load Reporting, HO Reporting, E-UTRAN Cell Activation, Energy Savings Indication, Failure Event Reporting)
elementList.description: The receiving RAN node, including the eHRPD eAN, shall discard any RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST/Multiple Report PDU containing this IE with value set to Cell Load Reporting , "Multi-Cell Load Reporting", HO Reporting , E-UTRAN Cell Activation , Energy Savings Indication or "Failure Event Reporting". The receiving eHRPD eAN shall discard any RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST/Single Report PDU containing this IE with value set to Cell Load Reporting , HO Reporting , E-UTRAN Cell Activation , Energy Savings Indication or "Failure Event Reporting".

definitionList.name: SON Transfer Request Container
descriptionList:
This container transfers request information
for the SON Transfer application.

NOTE:      The length of the SON Transfer Request
Container IE shall remain compatible with the maximum message size on the
Gb interface, this maximum size being determined depending on the lower layers
used on the interface and on their configuration, a typical (default) limitation
being 1600 octets for a Frame Relay sub-network as stated in TS 48.016 [30].

definitionList.name: SON Transfer Response Container
descriptionList:
This container transfers response
information for the SON Transfer application.

NOTE:      The length of the SON Transfer
Response Container IE shall remain compatible with the maximum message size
on the Gb interface, this maximum size being determined depending on the lower
layers used on the interface and on their configuration, a typical (default)
limitation being 1600 octets for a Frame Relay sub-network as stated in TS
48.016 [30].

elementList.name: Energy Savings Indication
elementList.description: The Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018 [18]) shall be the same as received in the RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST Application Container. The RAT Discriminator field shall be set to 'E-UTRAN'.

elementList.name: Failure Event Reporting
elementList.description: The Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018 [18]) shall be the same as received in the RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST Application Container. The RAT Discriminator field shall be set to 'E-UTRAN'.

definitionList.name: SON Transfer Cause
descriptionList:
This container indicates the cause why the Application
Error Container IE for the SON Transfer application defined in TS 48.018
[18] is sent.

elementList.name: HO Reporting Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Application Container Syntax Error, Inconsistent Reporting Cell Identifier, Unspecified, )

elementList.name: Cell Activation Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Application Container Syntax Error, Inconsistent Reporting Cell Identifier, Unspecified, )

elementList.name: Cell State Indication Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Application Container Syntax Error, Inconsistent Reporting Cell Identifier, Unspecified, )

elementList.name: Failure Event Reporting Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Application Container Syntax Error, Inconsistent Reporting Cell Identifier, Unspecified, )

definitionList.name: Cell Load Reporting Response
descriptionList:
This IE contains response information for
inter-RAT cell load reporting.

elementList.name: E-UTRAN Response
elementList.reference: E-UTRAN Cell Load Reporting Response B.1.6

elementList.name: UTRAN Response
elementList.description: Contains the Cell Load Information Group IE as defined in TS 25.413. The receiver shall ignore the value of the Source Cell Identifier IE within the Cell Load Information Group IE.

elementList.name: GERAN Response
elementList.description: Contains the Cell Load Information Group IE as defined in TS 48.008. The receiver shall ignore the value of the Cell Identifier IE within the Cell Load Information Group IE.

elementList.name: eHRPD Response
elementList.reference: eHRPD Sector Load Reporting Response B.1.19

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN Cell Load Reporting Response
descriptionList:
This IE contains response information for inter-RAT
cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Group
elementList.description: Contains the Composite Available Capacity Group IE as defined in TS 36.423.

definitionList.name: Multi-Cell Load Reporting Request
descriptionList:
This IE contains request information for
inter-RAT multi-cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Requested Cell List
elementList.description: One of the IRAT Cell IDs contained in this list shall be carried in the Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018).

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. cells to be included. Value is 128.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the E-UTRAN CGI IE as defined in 9.2.1.38.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the Source Cell Identifier IE as defined in TS 25.413.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the Cell Identifier IE as defined in TS 48.018.

definitionList.name: Multi-Cell Load Reporting Response
descriptionList:
This IE contains response information for
inter-RAT multi-cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the E-UTRAN CGI IE as defined in 9.2.1.38.

elementList.name: UTRAN Response
elementList.description: Contains the Cell Load Information Group IE as defined in TS 25.413.

elementList.name: GERAN Response
elementList.description: Contains the Cell Load Information Group IE as defined in TS 48.008.

definitionList.name: Cell Load Reporting Cause
descriptionList:
This IE contains request information for
inter-RAT cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Cell Load Reporting Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Application Container Syntax Error, Inconsistent Reporting Cell Identifier, Unspecified, )

definitionList.name: Event-Triggered Cell Load Reporting Request
descriptionList:
This IE contains request  information for
inter-RAT cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Number Of Measurement Reporting Levels
elementList.description: The reporting node divides the cell load scale into the indicated number of reporting levels, evenly distributed on a linear scale below the reporting node's threshold for overload. The reporting node sends a report each time the cell load changes from one reporting level to another, and when the cell load enters and exits overload state. If the reporting RAT is eHRPD, triggering is based on sector load.

definitionList.name: Event-triggered Cell Load Reporting Response
descriptionList:
This IE contains response information for
event-triggered inter-RAT cell load reporting.

elementList.name: Overload Flag
elementList.description: If the reporting RAT is eHRPD, when this IE is present the sector load exceeds the threshold for overload. For other reporting RATs, when this IE is present the cell load exceeds the threshold for overload.

definitionList.name: HO Report
descriptionList:
This IE contains information for too early
inter-RAT HO without connection failure.

elementList.name: HO Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (LTE to UTRAN, LTE to GERAN, )

elementList.name: HO Report Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unnecessary HO to another RAT, , Early IRAT Handover)
elementList.description: The "Early IRAT Handover" code-point shall be used by the RNC according to TS 25.413 [19].

elementList.name: HO Source ID
elementList.description: Contains the cell ID of the source cell for the HO. This IE shall contain an E-UTRAN CGI, and shall be set to the same value as the Reporting Cell Identifier IE in TS 48.018 [18]

elementList.name: HO Target ID
elementList.description: Contains the cell ID of the target cell for the HO. This IE shall contain either a UTRAN Cell ID or a GERAN Cell ID.

elementList.name: Candidate Cell ID
elementList.description: This IE contains an E-UTRAN CGI.

elementList.name: Candidate PCI
elementList.description: This IE includes the Primary Cell Identifier and the EARFCN of detected cells not included in the Candidate Cell List IE and for which an E-UTRAN CGI could not be derived.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of candidate cells.

definitionList.name: Cell Activation Request
descriptionList:
This IE contains request information for
inter-RAT Cell Activation.

elementList.name: Cells to Activate List
elementList.description: One of the cell IDs contained in this list shall be carried in the Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018 [18]).

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the E-UTRAN CGI IE as defined in 9.2.1.38.

elementList.name: Minimum Activation Time
elementList.description: Seconds

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by an eNB.
  Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Cell Activation Response
descriptionList:
This IE contains response information for
inter-RAT Cell Activation.

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the E-UTRAN CGI IE as defined in 9.2.1.38.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by an eNB.
  Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Cell State Indication
descriptionList:
This IE contains notification information for
inter-RAT Cell Activation and Deactivation

elementList.name: Notification Cell List
elementList.description: One of the cell IDs contained in this list shall be carried in the Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION-REQUEST Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018 [18]).

elementList.name: Cell Identifier
elementList.description: Contains the E-UTRAN CGI IE as defined in 9.2.1.38.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. cells that can be served by an eNB.
  Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Failure Event Report
descriptionList: This IE contains information for inter-RAT handover with connection failure.

elementList.name: Too Early inter-RAT HO report from E-UTRAN
elementList.description: The Reporting Cell Identifier field in the RAN-INFORMATION Application Container for SON Transfer (TS 48.018 [18]) shall be the same as the Last Serving Cell Identity in the UE RLF Report.

elementList.name: UE RLF Report Container
elementList.description: RLF Report contained in the UEInformationResponse message (TS 36.331 [16])

elementList.name: Mobility Information
elementList.description: Information related to the handover; the external handover source provides it in the Source eNB to target eNB Transparent Container in order to enable later analysis of the conditions that led to a wrong HO.

definitionList.name: eHRPD Sector ID
descriptionList: This IE contains the eHRPD Sector ID.

elementList.name: eHRPD Sector ID
elementList.description: Defined in 3GPP2 C.S0024-B [27] sub-section 13.9

definitionList.name: eHRPD Sector Load Reporting Response
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the overall
available resource level in the eHRPD sector in downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: eHRPD Composite Available Capacity Downlink
elementList.description: For the downlink

elementList.name: eHRPD Composite Available Capacity Uplink
elementList.description: For the uplink

definitionList.name: eHRPD Composite Available Capacity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the overall available
resource level in the eHRPD sector in either Downlink or Uplink.

elementList.name: eHRPD Capacity Value
elementList.description: 0 indicates no resource is available, Measured on a linear scale.

definitionList.name: eHRPD Sector Capacity Class Value
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the value that classifies
the eHRPD sector capacity with regards to cells in other RATs. The IE only
indicates resources that are configured for traffic purposes.

elementList.name: eHRPD Sector Capacity Class Value
elementList.description: Value 1 indicates the minimum sector capacity, and 100 indicates the maximum sector capacity. There should be a linear relation between sector capacity and eHRPD Sector Capacity Class Value.

definitionList.name: eHRPD Capacity Value
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the amount of resources that
are available for load balancing relative to the total eHRPD resources. A
sector is expected to accept traffic corresponding to the indicated available
capacity.

elementList.name: eHRPD Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 indicates no available capacity, and 100 indicates maximum available capacity . Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

definitionList.name: Candidate PCI
descriptionList:
This IE contains the Primary Cell Identity
and the frequency of a detected LTE cell.

elementList.name: PCI
elementList.description: Physical Cell Identifier of the detected cell

elementList.name: EARFCN
elementList.description: Contains the EARFCN IE as defined in 9.2.1.95.
